Screening - THE FALL GUY w/ Director + VFX Q&A (Vancouver)

When: Sun May 05, 2024 11:00am to 02:00pm PDT

VES Members and Their Guests are Invited to an Opening Weekend Screening of Universal Pictures THE FALL GUY followed by a Live Interactive Q&A with the Filmmakers

Panelists will include Director/Producer David Leitch and Visual Effects Supervisor Matt Sloan, moderated by VES Fellow and former Board member Shannon Gans, VES. (All panelists participation based on availability.)

Please tweet your questions after the screening in order to participate in the Q&A panel (which will take place in Los Angeles) immediately following the screening. (be sure to include the hashtag, #VESFALLGUY, in your tweet.)

Please RSVP below (VES members must login to RSVP)

Sunday, May 5, 2024 at 11:00AM (There is a $4.75 parking fee per car)

Capilano University Bosa Centre Theater

2055 Purcell Way (entrance #2 off Skeena Road), North Vancouver, BC, V7J 3H5

Park in lot #2 or #3 at the North end of the campus. Arrive early for the screening to allow time to walk to the theater. The theater doors will lock after the screening starts as per University security so dont be late!

Recruitment Realities: Inside Perspectives on Hiring in VFX (Vancouver Hosting)

When: Wed May 01, 2024 06:00pm to 07:00pm PDT

Recruitment Realities: Inside Perspectives on Hiring in VFX

May 1st, 2024

6pm-7pm PDT

VES Vancouver is thrilled to be able to give you the opportunity to attend a virtual presentation from Cassandra Jovovic, who has over 15 years of dedicated experience in recruiting for our industry.

Cassandra will give you tips and advice on how to make your application seen, and shed an insight on what catches the attention of a recruiter and makes you stand out from the crowd! Her presentation will be followed by a live Q&A session.

https://www.linkedin.com/in/cassandrajovicic/

https://www.lalunarecruitment.com/about-1

You can register for this members only event below.

A link to the Zoom session will be emailed out on the afternoon of May 1st, 2024.

VES VANCOUVER PUB NIGHT AND MEMBERSHIP INTRODUCTIONS

When: Tue Feb 27, 2024 06:30pm to 11:00pm PST

Theyre baaaaaack

Were thrilled to invite members and industry professionals to our first Pub Night of 2024 on Tuesday February 27th from 6.30pm at Brewhall at 97 E 2nd Ave

Aside from being a chance to catch up with your industry friends, its also a great opportunity for anyone wanting to apply for the March 15th membership intake to be buddied up with an existing member to get an endorsement letter.

Dont forget though, if youve been a member previously you can re-activate that membership as part of the March intake by just applying, you dont need any letters! https://www.vesglobal.org/membership-application/

Well be serving some light snacks, and all members get a free drink on us.

If youd like to come along, you can RSVP here.

Hope to see you all there  and dont forget to spread the word

MY JOURNEY IN AI with FREDDY CHVEZ OLMOS

When: Wed Jan 24, 2024 12:30pm to 01:30pm PST

WEDNESDAY JANUARY 24TH, 2024 from 12.30m-1.30pm PST

VES Vancouver invite members to join us in a live Zoom presentation followed by a Q+A with Freddy Chvez Olmos!

Freddy brings nearly two decades of experience in the film and television industry. Born in Puebla, Mexico, Freddy studied special effects make-up in Los Angeles and received mentorship from the legendary Dick Smith, known for his effects work on the iconic horror film THE EXORCIST.

With his first short film as a co-writer/director, SHHH, Freddy received numerous international awards, and the project gained 1 million views upon its online debut. Notably, Guillermo del Toro praised the film for its compelling visual style.

As a member of the Directors Guild of Canada, Freddy directed for the CW and Netflixs anthology series, TWO SENTENCE HORROR STORIES, and contributed as a writer to the acclaimed Mexican horror anthology series LA HORA MARCADA, released in Halloween 2023.

Having worked in the visual effects industry in Vancouver, Freddy has been involved in productions helmed by Guillermo del Toro, Neill Blomkamp, Robert Rodriguez, Tim Burton, and Christopher Nolan. He has also been a part of Oscar and Emmy-winning VFX studios, including Double Negative, Industrial Light & Magic, Method Studios, Weta FX, Image Engine, and Scanline VFX. Recently, he contributed to the popular STAR WARS series OBI WAN-KENOBI and the third season of THE MANDALORIAN.

Presently, Freddy holds the position of Creative Director for Artificial Intelligence at Boxel Studio and is a sought-after guest speaker at prestigious venues, including San Diegos Comic-Con, TEDx, ACM Siggraph, and Spark Fx.

RSVP BELOW TO THIS MEMBERS ONLY EVENT

22nd Annual VES Awards Nomination Event

When: Sat Jan 13, 2024 04:00am to 03:59am PST

The 22nd Annual VES Awards season is underway, and its going to be more exciting than ever! Nomination Event to be held worldwide on Saturday, January 13, 2024.

This year we will have virtual and in-person Nomination Events. Current VES members can apply to judge on ANY in-person event that you can travel to or or ANY virtual panel in ANY time zone. This is the must-attend event of the awards season. You will see exclusive behind-the-scenes clips of the most striking visual imagery of 2023, and youll enjoy the single best networking opportunity of the year! Dont miss your chance to meet the best and brightest in the VFX field, catch up with old friends, and learn about new VFX techniques. Plus, youll have the satisfaction of helping to decide the best work to be presented to our colleagues in the industry and the press, as well as fans across the globe.

The Nomination Event is an all-day event and judges will receive details about specific times closer to the event. Please apply to a specific in-person location, or a particular time zone of a virtual panel (view the Region Map for the time zone that best fits your schedule). Please submit your Judge Application early to make this years VES Awards Nomination Event successful.

-The 22nd Annual VES Awards Committee

JUDGE APPLICATIONS ARE CLOSED please contact cassidy@vesglobal.org with any questions
